column1: This set features many uncommon parts such as white croissants, white space blasters, some new grass pieces, genie lamp, unikitty'
column2: s tails, elephant trunks, handles for paint roller and even a dog. oddly there is a camera too.

column1: Some uncommon colors such as a decent amount of dark orange and earth blue and a bit of spring yellowish green.
Some items are new in gold, like the 2x2 round profile bricks, the large flame pieces that make the wings, 1x1 plates, and the golden bows of the body.
Many great spare pieces as well, such as extra of most weapons (like the ghost sword
column2: and the compound bow, but not the crossbow), 2 gold bars, 2 gold light saber hilt, and it&#39
column3: s also the first time I get a spare snot piece&nbsp

column1: Great, though for my first set of the latest ninjago wave, I find them slightly less good so far than the figs of the anacondrai wave.
Cole : Great printing overall, headpiece molded in 2 colours with black and grey, head is single sided like usual, and I presume identical to the original 2011 Cole, though that'
column2: s the only Cole fig I own so far.

column1: Wu : Great printing overall. Compared with my Wu from 2011 fire temple, the head is the same, but the printing is of slightly better quality.

Pitch : Printing is ok, but seems inferior to the 2 previous figures in terms of details. Legs are transparent green. Very nice black head with prints in spring yellowish green and what might be sand blue. Large eyes, huge eyebrows, possibly some beard?

Hackler : Prints are the same than on Pitch. The shield is a sticker. Nice transparent green head with purple eyebrows and vampire fangs. Great head piece in earth blue with a transparent green back for whatever reason, which allows light to go through the head. The new sword is some opaque dark green color with transparent green around and it kinda looks like green flames.

Soul Archer : He has better torso printings than the 2 other ghosts. The head is transparent green with a beard and a metallic head band that is also printed on the back of the head, but the head appears dark and opaque under the head piece which doesnt
column2: let the light go through. Very nice new pieces on this one, the head piece is earth blue and purple, the shoulder pads are earth blue and I think titanium metallic, and the leg piece is earth blue and transparent green and can sit on 2 studs.

column1: The build is varried and uses many advanced technics, like technic build and snot, including studs on bottom and many original uses of pieces. Overall, it felt like the most creative build since I built arkham asylum breakout last year. Note that some steps could be challenging.

A dog carrying a crossbow which is pretty cute, then you have a haunted chariot, it carries a green crystal, some tiles with ghost faces printed on them and a cup of tea. by pushing an axle at the back you can activate the disk shooter, and it shoots pretty strong. The roof can fall.

The tea farm, nice looking build which is quite large (30 studs large), includes some nice built, like the top of the torii with all those blades, and the ornament on the left, great build with very few pieces. There are 2 fick missiles on the right side (the 2 gold pieces).
column2: The tea farm is made of 7 parts linked by ball joints, which gives a lot of flexibility on how to display it, though more classic hinge pieces would have felt more appropriate and wouldn&#39
column3: t have left gaps between each parts.

column1: The dragon is the main build, dimensions depends on how you pose it, but you could consider over 35
column2: cm long and over 20 cm wings to wings. Legs are articulated with technic joints at the top, and ball joints for the feet, the tail has a lot of flexibility. The head is on a ball joint, but is slightly heavy and sometimes fall. The body recreates a S shape with some success, though has an obvious flaw.

column1: The head is probably the best part of the build and features great building technics. It almost looks alive. However the lower jaw is a failure as it looks like it is attached under the head instead of being part of it, and it looks bad, unless seen from the front with the mouth closed.
Lots of content and playability, great parts, unique building experience, though the overall excellence is tainted by a few flaws.
Edit : after a few months, I remove a point from the final note due to better dragon models such as the green NRG Dragon or Queen dragon'

column1:
,TRUE,5,5,5,5,5 Faefrost","2016-12-23T08:07:54.73Z","Beautifully sculpted Dragon with some nice add ons","

I really like this dragon. It'
column2: s a nice comfortable size. With a ton of character, just like his master. &nbsp
column3: The additional scenery pieces really flesh out the set. They include a small piece of Sensei Wu&#39
column4: s retirement Tea Farm and a nice little Noodle Cart being used by the Ghosts to stage an attack. So lots of playability.

column2: A great assortment that really add to the set

column1: Sensei Wu - White Robes with broad Silver and Gold printing across his torso. Front/Back and Leg printing.He has the gold version of his hat. He carries a golden staff weapon with two horns at the top and joy of joys his blue teapot with a curl of smoke (fire?) coming from it. (OK it'
Cole - in one of his standard black well printed get ups. He has the two colored mask, plus black shoulders and scabbards. His weapons are swords plus a large golden staff/axe.

column2: s Dog, armed with his little side mounted wheeled Crossbow. Good Doggie

column1: Soul Archer - One of the more distinct of the Ghosts. The wraithlike Soul Archer. He is a gorgeous figure. His legs are the two color trans neon green and normal green swirled to form the vaporus
column2: ghostlike lower body that we have seen in Ninjago, CMF&#39
column3: s and Ghostbusters. His Torso has the most detailed printing of the 3 baddies, with some very nice front and back printing. He further has a 2 color armor piece for his torso and shoulders that looks like tattered cloth. His head is trans neon green with a ghostly face with a metal headband. His cowl is a new 2 color one, with a semi pointed top and a purple band. He weilds&nbsp

column1: Hackler - A Ghost Ninja. He has the standard Trans neon
column2: ghost legs that most have and the same torso as Pitch. His head is in Trans neon and he wears a new 2 part Ninja cowl, where the backhalf is also trans neon, giving him some cool effects including some light piping to his eyes. He has a classic X shaped PoP scabbard with two neon green swords. He also carries a stickered shield and a large flaming green sword/axe weapon. One problem he does suffer from. With the Trans clear head and elements of the hood trans clear, his head gets stuck in his hood.&nbsp

column1: Pitch - Ghost Warrior His legs and torso are the same as Hackler. He has a printed black ghost head and wears a dark blue bandana and Wu style straw hat in purple. he has a basket on his back and carries a pitchfork
Screamer - We get one soul possesing Screamer in this set. With the most common face print. These things are great. A Ghostly version of the Alien Brain Suckers from Alien Conquest.

column3: Pretty much the entire set is unexpected, unusual or interesting parts used in even more interesting ways. From strange colors to creative uses for things you just weren&#39
column5: s Head in particular is all rare or atypically colored odd parts.&nbsp

column3: All three builds are quite good. The two smaller builds are the Ghosts weaponized Noodle Cart, and a part of Sensei Wu&#39
column4: s Tea Garden. Both do the job and have some great detailing. The Noodle cart can fire disks, but still looks great as a pushcart. Wu&#39
column5: s Tea Garden has some neat part use to form the lanterns and the asian arch.&nbsp

column1: The Dragon itself is a really nice design. Granted articulation is, meh, but it makes up for it in good looks. The head is a masterpiece, achieving a true brick built asian
column2: dragon looking head. The body flows well and is servicable. The tail is kind of scrawny however. The hero factory lightning bolts in gold giv ethe wings a somewhat hairy and asian feel to them. They feel like something other than normal traditional bay wings on a dragon. They have some limited posability.&nbsp
A great set at a fantastic price for what it comes with. 5 minifigs
column3: a dog. An Aeroblade. Disk Shooters and Flick Fires. There is a lot to like here. Not perfect. But good value.
